alert.note: Alert for Brown; Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cherry and northern Brown Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Johnstown, or 16 miles northwest of Ainsworth, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Johnstown around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hofeld Lake, Wood Lake, Moon Lake and Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 220 and 238. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
